title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium] 11／16 4pm, Ground X 한재선 대표, ˝The Future of Digital Assets - Empowering Digital Ownership for Everything˝
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium] 11／16 4pm, Ground X 한재선 대표, ˝The Future of Digital Assets - Empowering Digital Ownership for Everything˝ date:2020-11-16T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=9470&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:제목 : The Future of Digital Assets - Empowering Digital Ownership for Everything 장소 : ZOOM을 통한 온라인 강연 (링크: https://kaist.zoom.us/j/91214104787?pwd=dzNiYWd0VDh6NXQ3T3c0ZkhWSjVDUT09) 언어 : 한국어(Korean) 약력 Jason Han is a CEO of Ground X, a blockchain subsidiary of Kakao which was founded in early 2018. Ground X became the most influential blockchain company in Korea with the key products, Klaytn, its own public blockchain platform, and Klip, a digital asset wallet embedded into Kakaotalk. Backed in 2005, He received Ph.D in electrical engineering and computer science at KAIST. In 2007, He founded NexR, the first big data and cloud computing tech startup in Korea, which built a Hadoop-based big data platform and AWS-like public cloud service. He also led the ecosystem of big data and cloud computin technologies in Korea by organizing a Korean Hadoop community in 2007 and holding PlatformDay, a technical conference on big data and cloud computing for 6 years. NexR was acquired by KT(Korea Telecom) in 2011 and he led KT NexR as a CEO for three years. After that, he co-founded FuturePlay and took a role of CTO. FuturePlay is a tech-centric accelerator and early-stage investor, focusing on tech startups in APAC. He invested in dozens of startups around AI, big data, cloud, IoT and so on and gave them technical mentoring. He also taught an innovative business model and IT trends in KAIST MBA as an adjunct professor for 7 years since 2007. 개요 디지털 세상에서 보내는 시간이 급격히 증가하면서 디지털 세상에서의 아이템, 컨텐츠, 기록 등에 대한 소유권 이슈가 중요해지고 있다. 또한 부동산이나 주식과 같은 아날로그 세상에서의 자산 역시 빠르게 디지털 형태로 표현되고 거래되기 시작하고 있다. 이와 같이 디지털 형태로 표현될 수 있는 모든 자산의 형태를 디지털 자산이라고 한다. 게임 아이템이나 디지털 굿즈부터, 모바일 머니, 디지털 상품권, 쿠폰, 포인트/마일리지, 가상자산 등이 쉽게 생각해 볼 수 있는 디지털 자산이다. 여기에 주식이나 부동산, 저작권 등도 토큰화를 통해 디지털 자산으로 전환될 수 있다. 궁극적으로는 데이터가 디지털 자산화의 과정을 거쳐 데이터 경제를 완성할 것이다. 디지털 자산이 가능하게 된 것은 디지털 개체들에 소유권을 부여하고 비가역적인 거래 증명이 가능한 블록체인 기술 등장 덕분이다. 본 세미나에서는 블록체인의 킬러 응용으로서 디지털 자산의 개념을 소개하고 다양한 형태의 디지털 자산 사례를 소개한다. 디지털 자산의 핵심인 토큰화 기술, 특히 Non-Fungible Token(NFT)을 통해 디지털 소유권을 부여하는 방식에 대해 소개하며 향후 디지털 자산 기술의 발전 방향에 대해 논의한다. 그리고 디지털 자산이 만들어갈 미래 사회와 가능성에 대해 논의해 본다. With the rapid increase in time spent in the digital world, ownership issues of items, contents and records in the digital world are becoming important. In addition, assets in the analog world, such as real estate and stocks, are quickly being expressed and traded in digital form. All such forms of assets that can be expressed in digital form are called digital assets. Game items, digital goods, mobile money, digital gift certificates, coupons, points/mileages, and virtual assets are digital assets that can be easily thought of. On top of that, stocks, real estate, and copyrights can also be converted into digital assets through tokenization. Ultimately, data will go through the process of digital assetization to complete the data economy. Digital assets have become possible thanks to the emergence of blockchain technology that gives digital ownership and allows non-reversible proof of transactions. This seminar introduces the concept of digital assets as the killer application of the blockchain and introduces examples of various forms of digital assets. I'll introduce tokenization technology, which is the core of digital assets, especially the way digital ownership is granted through Non-Fungible Token(NFT), and discuss the future direction of development of digital asset technology. At last, I'll discuss the future society and possibilities that digital assets will create. 전산학부 콜로퀴움 세미나와 관련한 추가 정보는 다음 링크를 참고하여 주시기 바랍니다: https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/colloquium/ location: Online(zoom) tag:csweb.calendar
